page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: There are{nine farms}in this area although land encroaches from farms in neighbouring blocks. The main emphasis is on{Dairy with several{Friesan herds.}Some land is given over to{Arable}farming and {rough grazing.}The latter during the Winter is used by sheep. Some farms plant potatoes, sweet corn and other {vegetables. All farms with dairy herds have their milk transported by{bulk {tankers,}however signs of previous methods still exist with several roadside churn platform still visible and churns turn up on several occasions finding new uses. The neighbouring town of {Chippenham}is the focal point of the agricultural trade here containing one of the largest{cattle markets}in the S.W.
